ddf.catalog.plugin.groomer.metacard

Class StandardMetacardGroomerPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.plugin.groomer.AbstractMetacardGroomerPlugin
      • ddf.catalog.plugin.groomer.metacard.StandardMetacardGroomerPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreIngestPlugin

    public class StandardMetacardGroomerPlugin
extends AbstractMetacardGroomerPlugin
    Applies general Create and Update grooming rules such as populating the Metacard.ID, Metacard.MODIFIED, and Metacard.CREATED fields.

      StandardMetacardGroomerPlugin()

      This method is called on each Metacard in the UpdateRequest.

    • Method Detail

      • applyCreatedOperationRules

        protected void applyCreatedOperationRules(CreateRequest createRequest,
                                          Metacard aMetacard,
                                          Date now)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetacardGroomerPlugin
        This method is called on each Metacard in the CreateRequest. It allows for the modification of the Metacard object within the request.
        Specified by:
        applyCreatedOperationRules in class AbstractMetacardGroomerPlugin
        Parameters:
        createRequest - the entire CreateRequest object
        aMetacard - a Metacard within the request
        now - a current Date timestamp to be optionally used to timestamp each Metacard

      • applyUpdateOperationRules

        protected void applyUpdateOperationRules(UpdateRequest updateRequest,
                                         Map.Entry<Serializable,Metacard> anUpdate,
                                         Metacard aMetacard,
                                         Date now)
        Description copied from class: AbstractMetacardGroomerPlugin
        This method is called on each Metacard in the UpdateRequest. It allows for modification of the Metacard object within the request.
        Specified by:
        applyUpdateOperationRules in class AbstractMetacardGroomerPlugin
        Parameters:
        updateRequest - the entire UpdateRequest object
        anUpdate - a single Update within the UpdateRequest
        aMetacard - a Metacard within the request
        now - a current Date timestamp to be optionally used to timestamp each Metacard, such as stamping each Metacard with the same Metacard.MODIFIED date.
